context_bundle.summary: Flux: GitOps toolkit for Kubernetes. CNCF graduated project. Key features: GitRepository/HelmRepository sources, Kustomization/HelmRelease reconciliation, image automation, multi-tenancy, notifications, progressive delivery with Flagger integration.

onboarding.quick_start: Flux: 1) flux bootstrap github --owner=ORG --repository=REPO --path=clusters/prod, 2) Creates GitRepository + Kustomization CRs, 3) Add HelmRelease for Helm charts, 4) Flux auto-syncs from Git.
common_patterns: Kustomization: spec: { sourceRef: { kind: GitRepository, name: flux-system }, path: ./clusters/prod }
HelmRelease: spec: { chart: { spec: { chart: myapp, sourceRef: { kind: HelmRepository } } }, values: {} }

known_errors.error: Kustomization reconciliation failed: kustomize build failed
known_errors.solution: Run kustomize build locally to debug, check flux logs -n flux-system
known_errors.prevention: Validate manifests in CI before merge
